data.title: Marilyn Monroe with Joe DiMaggio and Arthur Miller
data.meta_description: Marilyn Monroe is dead 8/6 at 36, victim of an overdose of drugs which ended a tempestuous, glamorous rocket ride to fame and personal tragedy.  At left, she is shown with Joe DiMaggio, in this file photo, at the time of their marriage on 1/14/54.  At right, she is shown in this file photo with playwright Arthur Miller shortly before their marriage in June, 1956.
